Package org.apache.jena.query.text.assembler

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ConfigurableAnalyzerAssembler
    Assembler to create a configurable analyzer.
    DefineAnalyzersAssembler  
    DefinedAnalyzerAssembler  
    DefineFiltersAssembler  
    DefineTokenizersAssembler  
    EntityDefinitionAssembler  
    GenericAnalyzerAssembler
    Creates generic analyzers given a fully qualified Class name and a list of parameters for a constructor of the Class.
    GenericFilterAssembler
    Creates generic filters given a fully qualified Class name and a list of parameters for a constructor of the Class.
    GenericFilterAssembler.FilterSpec  
    GenericTokenizerAssembler
    Creates generic tokenizers given a fully qualified Class name and a list of parameters for a constructor of the Class.
    GenericTokenizerAssembler.TokenizerSpec  
    KeywordAnalyzerAssembler
    Assembler to create keyword analyzers.
    LocalizedAnalyzerAssembler
    Assembler to create localized analyzer.
    LowerCaseKeywordAnalyzerAssembler
    Assembler to create lowercase keyword analyzers.
    Params
    Parses assembler parameter definitions for GenericAnalyzer, GenericFilter, and GenericTokenizer.
    PropListsAssembler  
    SimpleAnalyzerAssembler
    Assembler to create simple analyzers.
    StandardAnalyzerAssembler
    Assembler to create standard analyzers with keyword list.
    TextAssembler  
    TextDatasetAssembler  
    TextIndexLuceneAssembler  
    TextVocab
